entry.sentence: Even a drug-addicted girlfriend would not have been a reason to go so far as to break away from him , the son .

entry.deps: advmod(girlfriend-4, Even-1) det(girlfriend-4, a-2) amod(girlfriend-4, drug-addicted-3) nsubj(reason-10, girlfriend-4) aux(reason-10, would-5) neg(reason-10, not-6) aux(reason-10, have-7) cop(reason-10, been-8) det(reason-10, a-9) root(ROOT-0, reason-10) aux(go-12, to-11) infmod(reason-10, go-12) advmod(as-15, so-13) advmod(as-15, far-14) advmod(go-12, as-15) aux(break-17, to-16) xcomp(go-12, break-17) prep_away_from(break-17, him-20) det(son-23, the-22) appos(him-20, son-23)

entry.sentence: And that was just for the sake of reputation !
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC And) (NP (DT that)) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB just)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN sake)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN reputation)))))) (. !)))
entry.deps: cc(was-3, And-1) nsubj(was-3, that-2) root(ROOT-0, was-3) advmod(was-3, just-4) det(sake-7, the-6) prep_for(was-3, sake-7) prep_of(sake-7, reputation-9)

entry.sentence: Theo was so lost in his thoughts that he was not aware of where he was going .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Theo)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (RB so) (VBN lost) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ his) (NNS thoughts))) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD was) (RB not) (ADJP (JJ aware) (PP (IN of) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB where)) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBG going)))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubjpass(lost-4, Theo-1) auxpass(lost-4, was-2) advmod(lost-4, so-3) root(ROOT-0, lost-4) poss(thoughts-7, his-6) prep_in(lost-4, thoughts-7) mark(aware-12, that-8) nsubj(aware-12, he-9) cop(aware-12, was-10) neg(aware-12, not-11) ccomp(lost-4, aware-12) advmod(going-17, where-14) nsubj(going-17, he-15) aux(going-17, was-16) prepc_of(aware-12, going-17)

entry.sentence: Only when he noticed the long wall did he know that he was at the cemetery - the cemetery where Anna was buried .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (SBAR (WHADVP (RB Only) (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD noticed) (NP (DT the) (JJ long) (NN wall))))) (VP (VBD did) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBP know) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD was) (PP (IN at) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN cemetery)) (: -) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN cemetery)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB where)) (S (NP (NNP Anna)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBN buried))))))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: advmod(when-2, Only-1) advmod(noticed-4, when-2) nsubj(noticed-4, he-3) advcl(did-8, noticed-4) csubj(did-8, noticed-4) det(wall-7, the-5) amod(wall-7, long-6) dobj(noticed-4, wall-7) root(ROOT-0, did-8) nsubj(know-10, he-9) ccomp(did-8, know-10) mark(was-13, that-11) nsubj(was-13, he-12) ccomp(know-10, was-13) det(cemetery-16, the-15) prep_at(was-13, cemetery-16) det(cemetery-19, the-18) dep(cemetery-16, cemetery-19) advmod(buried-23, where-20) nsubjpass(buried-23, Anna-21) auxpass(buried-23, was-22) rcmod(cemetery-19, buried-23)

entry.sentence: Over there was also the cemetery café .
entry.parse: (ROOT (SINV (PP (IN Over) (NP (RB there))) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB also))) (NP (DT the) (NN cemetery) (NN café)) (. .)))

entry.sentence: How often he had sat here after his visits to Anna 's grave .
entry.parse: (ROOT (FRAG (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB How) (RB often)) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN sat) (ADVP (RB here)) (PP (IN after) (NP (PRP$ his) (NNS visits))) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (NNP Anna) (POS 's)) (NN grave))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Until he had decided to go to India .
entry.parse: (ROOT (FRAG (SBAR (IN Until) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN decided) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB go) (PP (TO to) (NP (NNP India)))))))))) (. .)))
